abstract: The Afghan Army is being given an armada of sophisticated armored vehicles along with months of training, but it remains to be seen how that will translate on the battlefield, after most Western forces are gone.
snippet: The Afghan Army is being given an armada of sophisticated armored vehicles along with months of training, but it remains to be seen how that will translate on the battlefield, after most Western forces are gone.
lead_paragraph: KABUL, Afghanistan - Can a fledgling Afghan Army plagued by corruption, illiteracy and years of atrophy maintain a $500 million fleet of sophisticated armored vehicles provided by American taxpayers?

headline.main: Training Concerns Hover Over Delivery of Afghan Equipment
